mapper.insert: insert into activity (name, show_start_time, show_end_time, venue_city, venue_name, venue_address, poster_image, source_channel, source_id, source_url, online, artist_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{showStartTime}, #{showEndTime}, #{venueCity}, #{venueName}, #{venueAddress}, #{posterImage}, #{sourceChannel}, #{sourceId}, #{sourceUrl}, #{online}, #{artistId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

name,

mapper.update:
update activity
name = #{name},
show_start_time = #{showStartTime},
show_end_time = #{showEndTime},
venue_city = #{venueCity},
venue_name = #{venueName},
venue_address = #{venueAddress},
poster_image = #{posterImage},
source_channel = #{sourceChannel},
source_id = #{sourceId},
source_url = #{sourceUrl},
online = #{online},
artist_id = #{artistId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
